desc_en: The number of threads that the server uses for receiving requests from the network and sending responses to the network. Noted: each listener (except for controller listener) creates its own thread pool.
desc_zh: 服务器用于接收网络请求和向网络发送响应的线程数。注意：每个监听器（控制器监听器除外）都会创建自己的线程池。

desc_en: The number of threads that the server uses for processing requests, which may include disk I/O
desc_zh: 服务器用于处理请求的线程数，可能包括磁盘I/O操作。

desc_en: The SO_SNDBUF buffer of the socket server sockets. If the value is -1, the OS default will be used.
desc_zh: 套接字服务器套接字的SO_SNDBUF缓冲区大小。如果值为-1，将使用操作系统默认值。

desc_en: The SO_RCVBUF buffer of the socket server sockets. If the value is -1, the OS default will be used.
desc_zh: 套接字服务器套接字的SO_RCVBUF缓冲区大小。如果值为-1，将使用操作系统默认值。

desc_en: The maximum number of bytes in a socket request.
desc_zh: 套接字请求的最大字节数。

desc_en: The default number of log partitions per topic.
desc_zh: 每个主题的默认日志分区数。

desc_en: The number of threads per data directory to be used for log recovery at startup and flushing at shutdown.
desc_zh: 每个数据目录用于启动时日志恢复和关闭时刷新的线程数。

desc_en: The replication factor for the offsets topic (set higher to ensure availability). Internal topic creation will fail until the cluster size meets this replication factor requirement.
desc_zh: 偏移量主题的复制因子（设置更高以确保可用性）。内部主题创建将失败，直到集群大小满足此复制因子要求。

desc_en: The replication factor for the transaction topic (set higher to ensure availability). Internal topic creation will fail until the cluster size meets this replication factor requirement.
desc_zh: 事务状态日志的复制因子（设置更高以确保可用性）。内部主题创建将失败，直到集群大小满足此复制因子要求。

desc_en: Overridden min.insync.replicas config for the transaction topic.
desc_zh: 事务状态日志主题的min.insync.replicas配置覆盖值。

desc_en: The number of hours to keep a log file before deleting it (in hours), tertiary to log.retention.ms property.
desc_zh: 删除日志文件前保留的小时数（以小时为单位），优先级低于log.retention.ms属性。

desc_en: The maximum size of a single log file
desc_zh: 单个日志文件的最大大小。

desc_en: The frequency in milliseconds that the log cleaner checks whether any log is eligible for deletion.
desc_zh: 日志清理器检查是否有日志符合删除条件的频率（毫秒）。

desc_en: The max time that the client waits to establish a connection to ZooKeeper. If not set, the value in zookeeper.session.timeout.ms is used.
desc_zh: 客户端等待建立ZooKeeper连接的最长时间。如果未设置，将使用zookeeper.session.timeout.ms的值。

desc_en: The amount of time the group coordinator will wait for more consumers to join a new group before performing the first rebalance. A longer delay means potentially fewer rebalances, but increases the time until processing begins.
desc_zh: 组协调器在执行第一次重平衡之前等待更多消费者加入新组的时间。更长的延迟意味着可能更少的重平衡，但会增加开始处理的时间。

desc_en: Enables delete topic. Delete topic through the admin tool will have no effect if this config is turned off
desc_zh: 启用删除主题功能。如果关闭此配置，通过管理工具删除主题将无效。

desc_en: Enable auto creation of topic on the server.
desc_zh: 启用服务器上主题的自动创建功能。
